content:
Any thoughts on why I can't get Clean URL's to work on my local lando setup for an existing site.
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/404-error-everything-front-page#comment-2638
@BWPanda - I got it. The details are all in the forum post. I was using a super simple .lando.yml file. I posted it in the forum

It seems I had two different problems. One problem I created on my own while trying to solve the first problem, then it didn't work after I fixed the first problem, because of the second problem I had created during the process of solving the first problem.
